scripts.test: cypress-tags run -- -e GLOB='cypress/e2e/**/*.feature' TAGS='not @PipelineIgnore' --browser chrome; node cucumber-html-reporter.js
scripts.test:all-browsers: (cypress-tags run -- -e GLOB='cypress/e2e/**/*.feature' TAGS='not @PipelineIgnore' --browser chrome ; node cucumber-html-reporter.js) & (cypress run -- -e GLOB='cypress/e2e/**/*.feature' TAGS='not @PipelineIgnore' --browser firefox ; node cucumber-html-reporter.js) & (cypress run -- -e GLOB='cypress/e2e/**/*.feature' TAGS='not @PipelineIgnore' --browser edge ; node cucumber-html-reporter.js)
